alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Lonoke; Perry; Prairie; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perry, northwestern Prairie, northern Lonoke, southeastern Conway, central Faulkner, southern White and northern Pulaski Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Quitman to near Greenbrier to Happy Bend. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Searcy... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Downtown Little Rock... Morrilton... Lonoke... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Beebe... Ward... Vilonia... Mayflower... Austin in Lonoke County... Judsonia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Lonoke; Perry; Prairie; Pulaski; White
